group_1.narration: People give chocolate to those they love on@Valentine's Day.
My mom gave it to my dad and brothers.
She used the holiday as a weapon to show@me just how unwelcome I was.
I thought I'd give chocolate out, too.
I used my tiny allowance to buy some.
I worried over it, but thankfully@they accepted it.
The next morning, on my way to school,@I noticed the chocolate in the trash.

group_1.textRight: Are you okay? You look kind of pale.
Maybe I shouldn't have asked you to come@shopping with me...
You were? Don't push yourself, okay? [chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100151:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]If @anything comes up you can talk to me.

group_1.narration: The supermarket's Valentine's chocolate@section brought it all back...
I shouldn't let it bother me anymore.
I need to forget about all of that.

group_1.textRight: Ah, it's almost the busiest time of the day.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, everyone's out getting their groceries@for dinner.

group_1.textRight: It's packed in the vegetable section, too...@[chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100151:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:100151:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1][chara:100151:mouthOpen_1]Oh!
There's only one head of cabbage left!@Sana, let's go grab it!
[chara:100151:lipSynch_0][chara:100151:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]Thank goodness we made it in time!
You can't make a hot pot without cabbage.
So, we have tofu, meat, green onions, and@mushrooms...
I wonder if everyone likes fish.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I...I'd like to have that!

group_1.textRight: Then let's get fish too! I love hot pots@with fish!

group_1.narration: And everyone at Mikazuki Villa accepted me.
So for Valentine's Day this year, I really@want to express how thankful I am.
I want to give them some chocolates!
